title: The AH-450B Space Heater Demo ►NewAir
description:
Looking for a great way to heat your space this fall and winter?
In this we video take a look at the AH-450B space-heater from Newair.

This is a modern update on a classic heater. It's slim, portable design and wheels makes it really easy to move around. This portable heater is also light weight and can be easily picked up from it's handle. Although this heater is small in size, it’s pretty powerful; you can heat up to 150 square feet, which is good for medium size rooms like a bedroom, den or kitchen. Reviewers say that it can also heat large, open-room areas like a living room/kitchen combos.

The AH-450B space heater warms quickly and efficiently. You have the option to set a timer for up to 10 hours. You can set it to go off after you’ve gone to sleep or let it run for a while when you’re not home. The compact design also makes it easy to store away when you are not using it.

Concerned about having a portable heater around kids? The AH-450B has a tip over safety protection switch unit built into it that will turn it off it gets knocked over. There is also an auto-turn off feature to prevent the unit from overheating or getting too hot. The display is easy to see and it comes with a remote control for more convenient temperature adjusting.

Watch the video to learn more about the AH-450B space heater from Newair.

transcripts: Hi I'm Esmeralda and today we're going to look at the NewAir AH 450B, this heater is the modern update on the classic radiator heaters you can see that its like a radiator but has a slim portable design which makes it easy to move around. For its small size it's pretty powerful it can heat up for room about a hundred fifty square feet that's like a medium sized bedroom or like a den. We've had a reviewer say that this heater can heat up open areas, large open areas like kitchen or maybe a patio. There's a timer on it you can set it to go off after you've gone to sleep or maybe after you've been out of the house for a while it has a setting for up to 10 hours. We've got good reviews that heats up the room quickly and it's not overly hot to the touch. It's super quiet it has no moving parts it just heats up the oil that's inside the fence and it circulates. It's all enclosed so there's no burning smell like a lot of heaters tend to have. It's got this spot for the cord where you can wrap it up and keep it out of the way when it's not in use during the off-season. There is a really good safety feature built into it so if he gets knocked over it would automatically turn off, it's really good if you have kids running around your house and there's an overheat switch so it will automatically shut off if it senses that it's getting warmer than it should be. The display is easy to see even comes with a remote control so you can adjust it without having to get up and go over to it. Thank you for checking out the AH 450B space heater from NewAir.
